title: Himi 432
lyrics:
7.7.7.7. loua
1.
Pule’anga ‘o e Lang
i
,
Ko e ha nai ha tatau
Te tau fokotu’u ki ai,
Hono ivi lahi fau?
Ko e me’i lēvani
‘Ai he māhoa’a ‘e tol
u
;
Kae totolo atu ai,
Pea faifai ‘o totof
u
.
2.
Anga ‘o e lotu ē
‘Ene ngāue he tangata;
He ka tō mai hono ‘uk
e
!
Kae fai atu pē ‘o lav
a
.
Lava hoto laumāli
e
,
Lava hoto ‘atamai,
Ngaahi anga fulipē
‘O e sino faingataʻa n
i
.
3.
Anga ‘o e lotu ia
‘Ene ngāue ‘i māmani:
Tofu ai ha fu’u fa’ahing
a
,
Ha fonu
a
mo ha kakai.
Semi ē na’e mu’omu’a,
Sēfeti na’e hoko ai,
Hami ‘eni ku
o
mo’ua
‘I he fai ‘a e lēvani.
4.
Mālō pe he tu’
u
tu’uni
‘A hotau ‘Otua lelei:
Ke ‘omai ha meʻa mo’u
i
Ke ue’i ‘emau mate n
i
,
‘Ofa ke u mo’ua au
‘I he me’i lēvani:
Mo māmani ke ne ma’u,
‘O liliu ke hēvani.*
